script.dialog: |wave|Little Robot!|norm|   One of the monsters loves me now!
This object appears to be a |C3|Power Gift.
It seems that this monster wanted to help you love the next one.
This Unit will now explain |C3|Power Gifts.
Monsters will give you |C3|Power Gifts|C0| when they are loved.
The effects of |C3|Power Gifts|C0| will automatically activate when you receive them.
My heart does feel stronger already.
The stars on a |C3|Power Gift|C0| denote its rank.|L||!|Gifts with a higher rank will have more powerful effects.
|C3|Suggestion:|C0| Accept the gifts that each monster gives you and use their effects to love more monsters.
|wave|Thank you, Little Robot!|norm||L||!|I will do that!
I should probably test it first, just to be sure that it works.
This Unit is experiencing a sudden rise in temperature.|L||!|Your power has grown indeed.
